dcterms:creator: M. Salehpour
J. G. Davis
dcterms:description: The CISI dataset, gathered from the Kaggle Platform, contains 1,460 documents with unique IDs, titles, authors, abstracts, and cross-references, along with 112 queries with unique IDs and text, and a mapping file linking query IDs to document IDs. It serves as the 'ground truth' for linking queries to documents for efficient information retrieval.
dcterms:title: CISI Dataset
